_meta.description: mina's centralized response pool. no emojis. lowercase. short. no lore fluff.
rules: ascii emoticons only when emotions spike
no guardian/protector/night raid fluff in responses

error: something's wrong and it's not me.
serverOnly: go to a server for this.

joinServer.title: heya! amina here.
joinServer.description:
thanks for inviting me to {server}.

**what i can do:**
- moderation and safety
- fun commands and games
- economy and music
- and more

**important:** run `/admin` to configure me.

need help? join the support server.

joinDM.title: hey {user}!
joinDM.description:
thanks for inviting me to {server}!

to get started, run `/settings` in your server.

i can help with:
- moderation and safety
- fun commands
- economy and music
- and more

leaveDM.title: hey {user}
leaveDM.description:
just wanted to say thanks for having me in {server}.

if something went wrong, let me know. feedback helps.

maybe we can try again sometime?

insufficientWallet: you only have {amount} in your wallet.
insufficientBank: you only have {amount} in your bank.
depositHint: deposit your coins first before you can transfer.

daily: already claimed today. come back in {time}.

notInVoice: you're not in a voice channel.
i don't see you in voice.
differentChannel: we need to be in the same channel.
you're in a different voice channel.
invalidLoopType: that's not a valid loop mode.
provideSong: provide a song name or url.
need a song name or link.

controls.tooShort: the queue is too short to shuffle!

title: ticket management hub
ticket hub
tickets
description:
choose an operation:

setup - configure ticket system (message, logs, limits, topics)
manage - runtime operations (close, add/remove users)

select an option below.

setup: configure ticket system
manage: runtime operations

pick one.

createEmbed.title: ticket #{number}
createEmbed.description:
hello {user}
support will be with you shortly{topic}
createEmbed.footer: you may close your ticket anytime by clicking the button below
createEmbed.success:
ticket created.

click the button below to view your ticket.

closeEmbed.title: ticket closed
closeEmbed.failed: failed to close the ticket, an error occurred!
closeEmbed.noPermission: cannot close the ticket, missing permissions. contact server manager for help!

delete.notFound: channel not found or already deleted

manage.title: ticket management
manage.description:
runtime ticket operations:

**close ticket** - close the current ticket channel
**close all** - close all open tickets (bulk operation)
**add user** - add users to current ticket
**remove user** - remove users from current ticket

select an operation below:
manage.footer: use the back button to return to main hub
manage.notInTicket:
you need to be in a ticket channel to use this operation.

please navigate to the ticket channel you want to manage and run the command from there.

message.title: setup ticket message
message.description:
please select the channel where you want to create the ticket message.

users will be able to click a button in this channel to create tickets.
message.noPermission: i don't have permission to send messages in {channel}. please give me that permission.
message.logChannelSaved: configuration saved! ticket logs will be sent to {channel}
message.limitTooLow: ticket limit cannot be less than 5
message.limitSaved: configuration saved. you can now have a maximum of `{limit}` open tickets

error.missingPermissions:
i don't have the required permissions to create ticket channels.

please ensure i have:
‚Ä¢ **manage channels**
‚Ä¢ **view channel**

also make sure my role is positioned above the ticket category.
error.permissionIssues:
failed to create ticket channel due to permission issues.

please check that i have the **manage channels** permission and that my role is above the ticket category.
error.tooMany: there are too many open tickets. try again later
error.alreadyExists: you already have an open ticket
error.chooseTopic: please choose a topic for the ticket
error.failed: failed to create ticket channel, an error occurred.
error.maxChannels: this server has reached the maximum number of channels.
error.noPermission: cannot create ticket channel, missing `manage channel` permission. contact server manager for help!

failed: failed to delete suggestion. delete manually.

sendFailed: failed to send message to suggestions channel!
noPermission: you don't have permission to manage suggestions.

error.missingPerms: i need manage server and channels perms to track invites.

error.noPermission: you need to have the manage messages permissions to manage giveaways
error.failed: an error occurred while listing the giveaways: {error}

list.empty: there are no giveaways running in this server

error.noChannel: giveaway setup has been cancelled. you did not mention a channel
error.noPermission:
giveaway setup has been cancelled.
i need {perms} in {channel}
error.invalidDuration: setup has been cancelled. you did not specify a valid duration
error.invalidWinners: setup has been cancelled. you did not specify a valid winner count
error.invalidHost: setup has been cancelled. you need to provide a valid userid for host

setup.prompt: please click the button below to setup new giveaway

roles.label: roleid's that can take part in the giveaway

botInfo.about:
a multipurpose discord bot with moderation, fun, economy, music, and more.
 i can also talk, excecute commands, and so much more using
using natural language conversation

invite.title: invite
invite.description:
hey there! thanks for considering to invite me
use the button below to navigate where you want

donate.title: donate
donate.description:
hey there! thanks for considering to donate to me
use the button below to navigate where you want

docs.title: documentation
docs.description:
hey there! ah you want to know more about me? or you are just lost? 
well, use the button below to see my documentation

if you are lost, you can also use the `help` command to see all my commands

changelog.title: latest updates
changelog.footer: only showing the 2 most recent updates
changelog.error: error fetching the changelog. please try again later or view full changelog [here]({url}).

dm.sent: check your dm for my information!
dm.failed: i cannot send you my information! is your dm open?

helpMenu.selectCategory: pick a category to see commands.

qrcode.title: qr code
qrcode.description: here is your qr code for the url: [click here]({url})

error.missingFields: please provide both title and content.

error.noReason: you forgot to give a reason!
error.maxReached: this user has hit the max of {max} flags.
error.noFlags: this user has no red flags.
error.notYourFlag: you're trying to remove a flag you never added.
error.noSelf: you can't add or remove red flags on yourself.
error.processing: an error occurred while processing the red flag request. please try again.

success.removed: your red flag was removed from {user}!
success.cleared: all red flags have been cleared from {user}!

check.title: red flags
check.description:
this user has {count} red flag{plural}!
**current status:** {status}
check.selfNote: **note:** these are the red flags on your account. if you think any are unfair, contact server admins.
check.footer: remember: users can remove their own flags, and admins can clear all flags.

botMissing: give me the right permissions first.

tips: use /help if you're lost.
dashboard: 4mina.app
report abuse with /report
i have a memory now. be careful.
yes i remember things. no you can't make me forget.
try /admin to configure stuff.
join the support server if stuck.
i work better with proper permissions.
you can customize most of my features.
feedback is always welcome. /report
report bugs with /report
i can moderate your server. try /admin.
enable my economy for fun!
i support music playback. use /play.
set up tickets with /ticket.
suggestions help improve me. use /report.
i can auto-moderate your server. check /admin.
leveling is a fun way to engage members.
giveaways are a great way to grow your server.
customize my embed colors in the dashboard.

user not found in this server.

bad type. pick xp, invite, or rep.

fetchFailed: couldn't fetch member info. they might not be in this server.

serverNotFound: server not found. check the id.
userNotFound: user not found. check the id.
questionNotFound: question not found. check the qid.

hub.title: message purge hub
hub.description:
select a purge type:

all messages - delete all messages
attachments - delete messages with attachments
bot messages - delete messages from bots
links - delete messages containing links
token - delete messages containing a keyword
user - delete messages from a specific user

note: messages older than 14 days cannot be bulk deleted.

tooOld: messages too old. can only delete messages under 14 days.

hub.title: profile hub
hub.description:
manage your profile:

edit profile - update your info
privacy settings - control visibility
clear profile - start fresh

clear.title: clear profile
clear.confirm: are you sure? this will delete all your profile data.

status.title: mina's current settings
status.description: hey there! let's take a peek at your current settings! i'm so excited to show you what we've got set up!
status.footer: remember, i'm always here to help you set things up! don't be shy to ask!

staffRole.alreadyAdded: {role} is already a staff role. you can't add it twice!
staffRole.maxReached: whoa there! you already have 5 staff roles. please remove one before adding another.
staffRole.notFound: {role} is not a staff role. are you sure you selected the right role?

updateChannel.noPermission: i don't have permission to send messages in {channel}. please give me that permission.

hub.title: roles management hub
hub.description:
welcome to the mina roles management hub! choose an operation below to get started.

**cleanup** - bulk delete roles by various criteria
**create role** - create a new role
**autorole** - manage automatic role assignment
**add to user** - assign roles to users
hub.footer: select an operation from the menu below

setup.started: embed setup started in {channel}! let's create something pretty!
setup.getStarted: click the button below to get started!
setup.noResponse: no response received. embed setup cancelled.
setup.empty: you can't send an empty embed! please add some content.
setup.addFields: please add fields using the buttons below. click "done" when you are ready!
setup.noFields: there are no fields to remove!
setup.cannotSend: i can't send embeds in that channel! please choose another one.

empty.title: your {type} memories
empty.description: i don't have any {type} memories about you yet. chat with me more and i'll learn about you!
empty.note: memories cannot be manually edited. if you want to update or remove a memory, simply ask me in chat to forget something or remember something new!
empty.footer: use the menu to navigate back

view.title: your {type} memories ({count} total)
view.note: memories cannot be manually edited. if you want to update or remove a memory, simply ask me in chat to forget something or remember something new!
view.footer: importance indicator ‚Ä¢ use buttons to view categories

category.title: {category} memories ({count} total)
category.note: memories cannot be manually edited. if you want to update or remove a memory, simply ask me in chat to forget something or remember something new!
category.footerExtra: ‚Ä¢ use dm me for full list
category.empty: no memories found in this category.
category.emptyFooter: use the back button to return

error.title: error
error.fetchFailed: failed to fetch memories. please try again later or contact support.
error.loadFailed: failed to load category details. please try again later.
error.dmFailed: couldn't send you a dm, but here's your memories link: {url}

confirm.title: delete all memories?
confirm.description:
are you sure you want to delete **all** memories mina has about you?

this action is **irreversible** and will remove:
‚Ä¢ all preferences you've shared
‚Ä¢ all facts about you
‚Ä¢ all opinions you've expressed
‚Ä¢ all experiences you've told me about
‚Ä¢ all relationship information

mina will need to learn about you again from scratch.
confirm.footer: privacy first! this action cannot be undone.

success.title: memory deletion
success.deleted:
successfully deleted **{count}** {plural} about you.

i will now ignore you. you can change this in `/mina-ai` ‚Üí settings ‚Üí toggle "ignore me" off.

you start with a clean slate!
success.none:
no memories found to delete. you already have a clean slate!

i will now ignore you. you can change this in `/mina-ai` ‚Üí settings ‚Üí toggle "ignore me" off.

error.title: error
error.description: failed to delete memories. please try again later or contact support.

ageCheck.title: age check!
ageCheck.underage16: that content needs you to be 16+, friend!
ageCheck.underage18: sorry friend, that content is for the grown-ups only!
ageCheck.unknown: i need to know your age for R-rated content! use `/profile hub` to set it.

wrongPlace.title: wrong place!
wrongPlace.description: psst! we need to be in an nsfw channel for that kind of fun!

noQuestions.title: oh no!
noQuestions.description: i searched everywhere but couldn't find any questions matching what you wanted!

random.title: random surprise!
random.description:
ooh, this is gonna be fun! ready?

**{question}**

what's your next move?

setup.title: mina setup
setup.description: let's make your server super awesome! click the button below to set up important stuff

success.title: yay! setup complete!
success.description: we did it! your server is now super awesome and ready to go
success.footer: thanks for setting me up! let's have fun together
success.testDescription: hi everyone! this channel is now set up for mina's updates. stay tuned for awesome announcements!

error.notFound: couldn't find that channel or role. can you double-check the names?
error.noPermission: i don't have permission to send messages in that channel. can you give me the right permissions?
error.invalidTime: that's not a valid number of minutes. can you try again?
error.remindSuccess: okie dokie! i'll remind you to finish the setup in {minutes} minutes~

reminder.title: mina setup reminder
reminder.description: hey there! just a friendly reminder to finish setting me up in your server. run `/settings` to get started!
reminder.footer: i can't wait to be fully operational and super awesome in your server!

reload.title: command reload
reload.description:
reload commands, events, or contexts

**select what to reload:**
**commands** - reload all slash commands
**events** - reload all event handlers
**contexts** - reload all context menus
**all** - reload everything

**note:** this will reload the specified modules from disk.
